description: Fast peer-to-peer file and directory transfers

label.title: Title
label.dragHereToSendFile: Drag here to send the file

hint.noModernFileAPIWarn: Warning: Your browser does not support modern file access APIs, making the `Folder synchronization` and `Send folder` features unavailable. Additionally, the file receiving limit is 1GB.
hint.toManyPeople: There are too many people currently connected, please try again later
hint.serverError: The service is abnormal, please try again later
hint.closeTheProxy: If you are currently in a proxy environment, please close the proxy and try again
hint.noSupportDirTrans2: The recipient's browser does not support directory transfer
hint.areYouSureContinue: Are you sure to continue the transmission?
hint.refusesToTransmit: The other party refuses to transmit
hint.waitingForConfirm: Waiting for confirmation from the other party
hint.noSupportDirTrans: The current browser does not support directory transfer
hint.noSupportFolderDrag: Drag and drop of folders is not supported
hint.pleaseSelectDirToReceiveSync: Please select the directory to receive synchronization
hint.pleaseSelectAdd: Please select the file you want to add
hint.pleaseSelectUpdate: Please select the file to update
hint.pleaseSelectDelete: Please select the file to delete
